Package it.polimi.ingsw.leaderCards

Class LeaderCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.leaderCards.LeaderCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Scoring
Direct Known Subclasses:
DepotLeaderCard, DiscountLeaderCard, ProductionLeaderCard, WhiteConversionLeaderCard
public abstract class LeaderCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements Scoring
LeaderCard refers to all the leader cards.

    • LeaderCard

      public LeaderCard()

  • Method Details

    • isPlayable

      public boolean isPlayable()
      isPlayable calls the Board to check if we match the requirements
      Returns:
      false if we don't match the requirements or the card's been already played or discarded, true otherwise.

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Returns:
      if the card's been played.

    • play

      public abstract void play() throws InvalidResourceException
      Check if the card is playable and plays it.
      Throws:
      InvalidResourceException

    • discard

      public void discard()
      Discard the leader card to get 1 faith point.

    • initDiscard

      public void initDiscard()
      initDiscard allows to discard the leaderCard without getting faithPoints. Used when the game starts and the leaderCards are hand out.

    • assignToBoard

      public void assignToBoard​(Board board) throws InvalidBoardException
      Assign the LeaderCard to the board.
      Parameters:
      board - containing the LeaderCard.
      Throws:
      InvalidBoardException - board is null

    • getPoints

      public int getPoints()
      getPoints returns the amount of points awarded by this LeaderCard
      Specified by:
      getPoints in interface Scoring
      Returns:
      The amount of points awarded by this LeaderCard
